resources.string: Are you sure you want to purchase this buster?

In this game you need to save this tree from dying.

To save tis tree you need to collect all binary numbers that are lost in decimals.

List of all binaries contain 40 groups of 25 number, when you collect a group you make one digital leaf alive.

Each leaf will help you to gain clicks when you are not in the app by adding numbers each minute.

In the shop you can buy busters for clicked numbers to help you.

Save this tree
